title: Luuurve Is a Many Trousered Thing
description: The original Sex God has re-landed, Masimo the Italian Stallion wants to be her boyfriend, and Dave the Laugh is still a regular snoggee. How will Georgia cope juggling all three boys of her dreams? Have her days on the rack of love really gone for good? Or will this just lead to confusionosity and merde?Laugh your knickers off at Georgia’s hilarious confessions – this brilliant new story is her funniest yet.
author: Louise Rennison
